title: Brand chain
text: Brand chain The stores under ROSHEN 'sweet quality mark' are open already in seven Ukrainian cities. Only here we sell our exclusive products made specifically for our consumers. The stores under ROSHEN 'sweet quality mark' are open already in seven Ukrainian cities. Only here we sell our exclusive products made specifically for our consumers. ROSHEN brand stores always mean a wide range of fresh and quality confectionary products, reasonable prices, charming atmosphere in selling areas as well as polite and welcoming staff. Here, you will find products that fit every taste and any occasion - chocolate bars, sweets, gift sets, caramel, biscuits, sponge rolls, cakes, pastry, rum cakes etc.
